title: Celtics-Lakers Rivalry, Injuries, Knicks | WHAT’S BURNIN ft. Helwani & Pierce | SHOWTIME Basketball
itunes:title: Celtics-Lakers Rivalry, Injuries, Knicks | WHAT’S BURNIN ft. Helwani & Pierce | SHOWTIME Basketball
description:
A special edition of WHAT'S BURNIN is here as Paul Pierce and Ariel Helwani step in for Matt and Stak to breakdown to the upcoming week in the NBA. Plus they discuss the Knicks, recent injuries and the Celtics-Laker's rivalry.  

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
